page.title: 08BWLCH Y GROES/NANT Y BRENNI
page.content:
My name is Danny Mumford, I am 8 and I live i{Bwlch y Groes. }The name of my house is Llwyn y Groes. My dad is a {poultry farmer,}he goes to market. My mum works at a {hotel. }I have 2 brothers called Lee and Ben. On the farm we have{2000 table birds and 300 {point of lay.}We have 8{sheep and some {ducks}. I have 10 point of lay hens, and 2 dogs called Tupse and Sally.
My name is Georgina Langley, I am 8 and live at{Nant-y-Brenni}on a farm. We have 10 cats, 3 dogs and 1 puppy. My mummy does her shopping at { {Newcastle Emlyn,}I go to{Glynarthen School. In the summer holidays daddy let a field for the{folk camp.
